channel.title: Yahoo! News Search Results for Baseball
channel.description: Yahoo! News Search Results for Baseball

item.title: Tupelo (Miss.) baseball on pace to finish unbeaten (USA Today)
item.description: Tupelo is almost halfway to becoming the first Mississippi high school baseball team in 22 years to finish a season unbeaten. The Golden Wave are 19-0 and have beaten opponents by an average of almost eight runs.

item.title: UM baseball team ranked No. 1 in nation (Miami Herald)
item.description: The University of Miami baseball team is No. 1 in the nation. Of 296 Division I baseball teams across the country, the Hurricanes, with a 26-2 overall record and 12-1 record in the Atlantic Coast Conference, are the best according to Baseball America and the USA Today/ESPN coaches' poll.

item.title: USC drops from top 10 in pair of baseball polls (The Greenville News)
item.description: The University of South Carolina dropped out of the top 10 in a pair of baseball polls today after being swept in a weekend series by the University of Georgia.

item.title: Slide show: Douglas baseball and softball (The Record-Courier)
item.description: The Damonte Ranch baseball team came to Tiger Field Thursday afternoon riding a 14-game win streak.

item.title: Riverside baseball ranked No. 2 in state (The Greenville News)
item.description: The Riverside High baseball team is ranked No. 2 in the state in Class AAA in the South Carolina Baseball Coaches Association poll.

item.title: Teens Rampage School With Baseball Bats, Machetes (KTRE-TV East Texas)
item.description: Eighteen students and a teacher at a school near Sydney, Australia, were treated for injuries today after being attacked by five teenagers armed with baseball bats and machetes.

item.title: Sidney Baseball Commission going back to basics (Sidney Herald-Leader)
item.description: Experience has taught Kirby Halvorson what it takes to field a successful baseball program. As a high schooler in Scobey, he played on five consecutive state legion championship teams.

item.title: Monday's college roundup: NSU baseball game again postponed; CNU gains sportsmanship honor (Daily Press)
item.description: Norfolk State's elusive efforts to play Maryland-Eastern Shore in baseball were delayed again because of rain.

item.title: PREP ROUNDUP: Oh's late-inning efforts give Jackson a 6-4 win in baseball (Everett Herald)
item.description: SHORELINE -- For six innings Saturday night, the Shorecrest baseball team matched Jackson run for run. Then Danny Oh took over.

item.title: Teens rampage through Australian school with baseball bats (Chicago Sun-Times)
item.description: SYDNEY, Australia---- Five teenagers brandishing baseball bats and a machete rampaged through a school in Sydney on Monday, smashing windows, terrorizing students and hitting a teacher over the head, police said. Eighteen students were also slightly hurt.
